gobblin.runtime.api

Interface JobExecutionStateListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JobLifecycleListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJobExecutionStateListenerImpl, DefaultJobLifecycleListenerImpl, FilteredJobLifecycleListener, JobExecutionStateListeners

    public interface JobExecutionStateListener
    Notification for changes in the execution state

      A standard implementation of JobExecutionStateListener#onStatusChange(JobExecutionState, RunningState, RunningState) as a functional object.
